name: Visible Mending 101
description:
You can bring something you’d like to mend, or practice on fabric scraps as we explore simple techniques like darning, and patchwork.

Visible mending shows that repairing is not just practical, but beautiful. It's a way to care for our clothes, extend their life, and add a touch of personality and colour along the way.

All materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own garment to work on.

name: Yoga + sound bowl experience at the Van Gogh Immersive exhibition
description:
Yoga + Guided Breathing + Sound Bowls + Journaling… in an art masterpiece. 🎨✨

You don’t want to miss this one-of-a-kind experience happening right here in Bangalore!

And the best part : you will get your own Wiselife yoga mat at the event !!

Date: 23rd August (Saturday)

Time: 8:30 am

Location: The Van Gogh Immersive Exhibition, Bhartiya Mall of Bangalore

Movement, mindfulness, and creativity — all surrounded by the magic of Van Gogh’s art.

location.name: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra

name: Deadly Dozen- SIS x Hyfit
description:
Get ready for the Deadly Dozen — a first-of-its-kind, women-only fitness experience in India. This powerful session combines circuit workouts, strength training, and explosive movements in a format that’s also beginner-friendly. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to level up your fitness game, this event is designed to push your limits while keeping you supported every step of the way.
Date: 23rd August
Time: 10:30 AM onwards
Location: HYFIT Fitness Club, HSR Layout, Bangalore
Expect a high-energy atmosphere, expert-led sessions, and a community of like-minded women coming together to train, sweat, and thrive. Don’t miss your chance to be part of this empowering movement.

name: Chopstick & Chill!
description:
🥢 Your Friday night just got an upgrade.
Soju cocktails, fiery tteokbokki, and a big community table — all in one playful supper experience.

📅 29th Aug | 7:30 PM onwards
📍 The Fatty Bao, Indiranagar
🎟 Limited seats. Book now before they’re gone.

name: Movie Screening: The Road (2001)
description:
"A filmmaker, Kobessov, awakens from an anxiety nightmare: during the preview of his newest film, the projectionist mixes up the reels and begins to show a bad karate film by accident. Although Kobessov objects to the mix-up, the public is ecstatic and refuses to allow the projectionist to interrupt the screening to show Kobessov’s film."

Our meetings consist of a screening of an arthouse film, followed by a discussion. The discussion is led by one of our members or sometimes a guest speaker and encourages members to share their thoughts and interpretations of the film.

Who are The Parallel Cinema Club?

A community-run film society, we are a collective of film enthusiasts who gather weekly to explore the world of cinema, discuss auteurs and themes, and occasionally host guest lectures.

You follow us on Instagram on @theparallelcinemaclub

name: River Weaves: Brocades of Banaras
description: Experience a unique event called River Weaves. More details are needed to provide a complete description.

name: Padharo Maro Desh – Flavours of Marwar
description: This monsoon, journey to the royal kitchens of Rajasthan without leaving the city. A week-long culinary celebration at F5, featuring authentic Marwari cuisine and signature dishes reflecting the rich culinary heritage of Marwar. The menu includes Dal Bati Churma, Gatte ki Sabzi, Laal Maas, Jodhpur Mirchi Wada, Ker Sangri, and Ghewar. Served as a traditional thali for lunch, the experience offers a taste of Rajasthan’s royal kitchens.

location.name: Hilton Garden Inn Bengaluru, Embassy Manyata Business Park
location.address: Hilton Garden Inn Bengaluru, Embassy Manyata Business Park, Bangalore

name: Theoretical Physics Seminar
description: This seminar will delve into the fascinating world of quantum many-body systems, focusing on measurements and feedback-induced phase transitions. Prof. Sumilan Banerjee from IISc, Bengaluru, will share his expertise on this complex topic.

name: Namratha Stanley Bar Takeover
description: Winemaker Namratha Stanley, author of Vineyard Melody and founder of Solicantus wines from Bordeaux, will host a tasting for the WIP team before taking over the bar. She'll pour her bottles and share the stories behind each glass, offering insights into the joy of Bordeaux wines. Stanley's journey from India to Bordeaux, founding Wine Equation and building her own label, adds to the event's unique appeal.
